Name: Ripple Cape
LongDescription: Restores HP if the Pokémon is in water. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to the team's Phione.  You can get a Ripple Cape at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Phione Song, a Phione Card, and a Wave Jewel. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
